channel.title: CVE Feed for Live Composer Team -- Page Builder: Live Composer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Live Composer Team -- Page Builder: Live Composer

item.title: CVE-2024-35779|2024-06-21T11:40:07.375Z -- live%20composer%20team -- page%20builder%3A%20live%20composer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.42.

item.title: CVE-2023-52193|2024-02-01T09:49:11.261Z -- live%20composer%20team -- page%20builder%3A%20live%20composer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.23.

item.title: CVE-2023-52206|2024-01-08T19:32:07.020Z -- live%20composer%20team -- page%20builder%3A%20live%20composer
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer live-composer-page-builder.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.25.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.38.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.35.
